name: .2D File Extension
summary: Learn about .2D files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A 2D file is a two-dimensional (2D) drawing created by Archway Systems VersaCAD, a CAD program used for drafting and dimensioning. It contains objects, lines, shapes, and measurements, and other details of 2D representations of buildings and components in a proprietary binary format.

content: Architects, engineers, and drafters may use 2D files to create, edit, and share design plans. During the drafting process, users can add precise measurements, annotations, and geometric constraints to ensure that the drawing accurately reflects the intended construction or manufacturing plan. They can then review the files before moving forward with a project.

instructions: You can open 2D files with Archway Systems VersaCAD in Windows and macOS. To open a 2D file with VersaCAD, select File â†’ Open.
